file_content.text: We're right behind you. The Geonosians won't know what hit them.
We'll head to the nearby speeder pad once you've cleared out the Geonosians. Good luck.
Thank goodness you're here. Cole was smart enough to hide after sending the call, but now they've got us pinned us down.
It's no use. The Geonosians are swarming over the supply depot, raiding our provisions.
What are Geonosians?
Geonosians?
They're a brutal, insect-like species. They don't look it, but they're brilliant technicians.
Isn't there some way to defeat them?
How do we stop the Geonosians?
Great. Nothing's ever simple.
I know it looks bad, but we can't give up.
Geonosians may look like insects, but they're brutal warriors and experts with technology.
Their battle droids alone killed some of our best men. We won't fare any better.
We can't wait. We must defeat the Geonosians before they take our remaining supplies.
Kill enough and you might be able to break them, salvage some of the supplies. Still, it's too dangerous.
I'll drive them out. The Force will guide me.
I'll take care of it.
The Force will help me stop the Geonosians.
I'll defeat them.
I'll strike them hard. They won't have a chance to escape.
I must act now.
I'll wipe out these aliens single-handedly. How many were there again?
Those bug are no match for me.
I guess you're leaving this up to me?
You sitting this one out?
This is our fight. We can help you defeat them.
Is that fear I'm sensing?
Cole's just nervous. We can take them.
No we can't! They'll blast us to pieces if we engage them!
Maybe if you attack the Geonosians, thin 'em out, we could sneak away in the confusion.
I'm not running away, whatever the danger. Please let us fight with you.
I won't risk your lives. Sit still until I've cleared the way.
Stay put until it's safe.
If you insist. I'm sorry we can't help.
You're just lucky your leader knows what's best for you.
I suppose you're right. Once the path's clear, we'll head for the nearby speeder pad. I know a doctor there who'll patch us up.
You came for experience, now's the time. You're in this battle.
It's your duty to fight.
It's a pleasure to serve with you.
We're not going to make it. This is madness!
He's delirious. I'll have the recruits sedate him, then we'll give the Geonosians a good thrashing.
Once we're done, we'll meet you at the nearby speeder pad. I know a doctor there who'll take care of us until you arrive.
